trans-unit.source: Specifies an installer that copies properties from a component to use at install time.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个安装程序，该程序从组件复制属性以供安装时使用。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller" />, you must override the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller.CopyFromComponent(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> method, and typically override the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller" />，必须重写<see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller.CopyFromComponent(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" />方法，通常也重写<see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />和<see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, copies all the properties that are required at install time from the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中被重写时，从指定的组件复制安装时需要的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: The installer should take all the information it can from the live component, and store it for use at install time.
trans-unit.target: 安装程序应考虑从实时的组件，它可以的所有信息并将其存储在安装时使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class `MyInstallClass`, which creates the event log and copies the properties of the event log component to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义了一个类`MyInstallClass`，该类创建事件日志并将日志事件的属性复制到的组件<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>。

trans-unit.source: It also checks whether the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> can perform the same kind of installation as the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 它还检查是否<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>可以执行相同类型的安装作为<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified installer installs the same object as this installer.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的安装程序是否与此安装程序安装相同的对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this installer and the installer specified by the <paramref name="otherInstaller" /> parameter install the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此安装程序和 <paramref name="otherInstaller" /> 参数指定的安装程序安装相同的对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller.IsEquivalentInstaller%2A> returns `true` only if this installer and the installer specified by the `otherInstaller` parameter install the same object.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller.IsEquivalentInstaller%2A>返回`true`仅当此安装程序和安装由指定`otherInstaller`参数安装相同的对象。

trans-unit.source: In such a case, calling the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method on either installer results in the same system state.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，调用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>或<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>上的相同的系统状态中任一安装程序结果的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class `MyInstallClass`, which creates the event log and copies the properties of the event log component to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义了一个类`MyInstallClass`，该类创建事件日志并将日志事件的属性复制到的组件<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>对象。

trans-unit.source: It also checks whether <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> object can handle the same kind of installation as <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 它还检查是否<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>对象可以处理相同类型的安装作为<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>。
